Interface DMS

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
DMSImpl
public interface DMS extends Device
DMS -- Dynamic Message Sign
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Field Details

    • SONAR_TYPE

      static final String SONAR_TYPE
      SONAR type name
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FAULTS

      static final String FAULTS
      Fault conditions. Semicolon-delimited list of fault conditions of the sign: `other`, `communications`, `power`, `attached_device`, `lamp`, `pixel`, `photocell`, `message`, `controller`, `temperature`, `climate_control`, `critical_temperature`, `drum_rotor`, `door_open`, `humidity`
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • PHOTOCELLS

      static final String PHOTOCELLS
      Photocell array. An array of photocell objects, one for each sensor, plus one for the composite of all sensors. Each object has 3 fields: `description`, `error`, and `reading`
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LIGHT_OUTPUT

      static final String LIGHT_OUTPUT
      Light output; Integer (percentage)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • POWER_SUPPLIES

      static final String POWER_SUPPLIES
      Power supplies array. An array of power supply objects, consisting of `description`, `supply_type`, `error`, `detail` and `voltage`
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CABINET_TEMPS

      static final String CABINET_TEMPS
      Cabinet temperatures array; Integer (Celsius)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • getExpireTime

      Long getExpireTime()
      Get current message expiration time.
      Returns:
      Expiration time for the current message (ms since epoch), or null for no expiration.
      See Also:
      • System.currentTimeMillis()
